Docs.typeparam: The type of objects to enumerate. must implement the interface.
Docs.summary: Exposes an enumerator that supports a simple iteration over a generic collection of objects.

Public Function GetEnumeratorContract () As IEnumeratorContract(Of C)

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
Docs.returns: An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
